items.sentence: I eagerly opened the envelope, hoping there'd be money in it.
I've been meaning to go to Boston, but things keep coming up.
I find it hard to believe Tom was involved in the kidnapping.
I don't think that we'll be able to solve this problem today.
The last thing Tom said to me was that he'd be here tomorrow.
You don't need to be involved at all if you don't want to be.
I'm sleepy because I stayed up all night studying for a test.
Tom was drunk and obnoxious at the party and started a brawl.
It's best for Tom not to be left alone in that frame of mind.
There used to be a lot of fish in this lake, but not anymore.
